resources.string: No tasks yet. Add tasks using the menu button of your phone.\n

- Priority one is high priority.
 - Effort is the estimated pomodoros to complete the task.
 - Break down tasks that will take more than 7 pomodoros.
Enter the length of your pomodoro in minutes. Don\'t over/under do it.
Enter the length of your small break in minutes. I said small!
Enter the length of your big break in minutes. Maximum: 24 hours :)
Suggested value is 4 adjust according to your preferences
Enable/Disable the audible chime at the end of a timer
Help text goes here. \n Oh rly? Ya rly!
